title: Vaishnavi Kempu & Kundan Short Haaram
materials: Emerald Accents. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite choker features a closely aligned kundan setting, meticulously handcrafted with traditional Telugu artistry. A central square pendant with emerald is surrounded by intricate filigree work, leading to a majestic Kempu ruby pendant below. Delicate gold bead hangings known as 'guttapusalu' add a touch of graceful movement.
colors: Primarily gold with the vibrant contrast of ruby red (Kempu) and emerald green.
occasions: and other grand occasions. Its elegance transcends tradition
making it a statement piece for high-end parties and celebrations.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and craftsmanship, this Haaram is a treasure for generations. The authentic Kempu ruby and high-quality Kundan reflect the richness of South Indian heritage. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A true heirloom piece.
